snippet: Mr. Richardson won Obie and Drama Desk awards for his first play produced off Broadway in 1960. He turned to writing magazine articles and books after two of his plays failed on Broadway.
abstract: Jack Richardson, New York playwright, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Richardson won Obie and Drama Desk awards for his first play produced off Broadway in 1960. He turned to writing magazine articles and books after two of his plays failed on Broadway.

headline.seo: Jack Richardson, New York Playwright, Dies at 78
headline.main: Jack Richardson, New York Playwright, Is Dead at 78
